statements.query: MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:GitHubOrganization)-[:MEMBER_OF]->(n:GitHubUser) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(n:GitHubOrganization) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:GitHubOrganization)-[r:MEMBER_OF]->(:GitHubUser) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
